name: Stags & Wolves
description:
There are 5 Stags hidden in this world, you must find them before the wolves find you. If you manage to find all 5 and enter the castle, make sure to screenshot the ending and DM us on Twitter.

Follow us on Twitter for future games: https://twitter.com/StagGamingClub

Join our discord to grow the gaming community: https://discord.gg/az87jz96re
